document.masterDocTitle: Checklist of Braconinae species of Turkey (Hymenoptera: Braconidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist of Braconinae species of Turkey (Hymenoptera: Braconidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution in Turkey :
Aegean region of Turkey ( Hagan,1929 ); Turkey ( Reed, 1935 ); Turkey ( Friese, 1963 ); Adana , Antalya , Burdur , Gaziantep , Icel, Kahramanmaras , ( Beyarslan, 1986b ); Kirklareli , Tekirdag ( Beyarslan, 1987a ); Southeastern Anatolia ( Yasarakinci & Kornosor, 1990 ); Turkey ( Achterberg, 1996 ); Adana , Antalya , Balikesir , Bilecik , Burdur , Bursa , Diyarbakir , Edirne , Erzurum , Gaziantep , Hatay , Icel, Kahramanmaras , Kilis , Kirklareli , Tekirdag , Van ( Beyarslan, 1999 ); Burdur ( Zeki, Ozdem & Bozkurt, 1999 ); Amasya , Karabuk , Kastamonu , Sinop , Zonguldak ( Beyarslan et al. 2005 ); Tekirdag ( Beyarslan et al. 2006a ); Ordu , Samsun , Tokat ( Beyarslan et al. 2008a ); Erzurum ( Guclu & Ozbek, 2011 ); Adiyaman , Ankara , Balikesir , Canakkale , Diyarbakır , Elazig , Erzincan , Eskisehir , Imbros, Kayseri , Kirsehir , Konya , Malatya , Mardin , Nevsehir , Sivas , Tokat , Yozgat ( Beyarslan & Cetin Erdogan, 2012 ); Şanlıurfa (Beyaraslan et al. 2014).

Distribution: Australasian, Palaearctic, Ethiopian, Nearctic, Neotropical, Oceanic, Oriental; introduced into Canada-Ontario; Canada-Quebec; China-Taiwan; Fiji ; India ; Mexico ; Trinidad & Tobago ; U.S.A. - Florida ; U.S.A. - Illinois ; U.S.A. - Indiana ; U.S.A. - Louisiana ; U.S.A. - Massachusetts ; U.S.A. - Michigan ; U.S.A. - New York ; U.S.A. - Ohio ; U.S.A. - Pennsylvania ; U.S.A. - Texas ; U.S.A. - Virginia .
